main event: A crew of 4 AF pilots observed an unidentified flying object at Ellington AFB, Texas on the night of 27 June 1951.
interesting points: The object was brightly illuminated and observed for approximately 30 minutes., It appeared to be cylindrical in shape, estimated to be 30-40 feet in length., The object had a bright light emanating from the forward portion and a greenish glow around the midsection., The object made a rapid climbing turn and disappeared from view., No exhaust or trail was visible, and the object was estimated to be traveling at approximately 450 mph.
witnesses: AF pilots from the 384th Bomb Squadron
